fist_time_tavern:
There is a old man sitting close to a fire. 
As you aproach him he starts to talk:
old_man:
Old Man: There are evil creatures at the cave, they came after the beast arrivedat the mountain. 
Old Man: If you are planning in going there take this to help
torch: He takes a torch and gives to you
second_time_tavern: There is no one to interact right now
first_inn: As you enter at the Inn you see a man at the reception, you aproach and he says:
inn_keeper:
Inn Keeper: Hello traveler, I shall warn you we are full right now. 
Inn Keeper: Since that beast is at the mountain everybody who lived there fled. 
Inn Keeper: ...and now they are here waiting for someone to kill the beast. 
Inn Keeper: What??! You gonna kill the troll?? HAHAHAHAH!!! 
While he is laughting he takes something under his desk. 
Inn Keeper: At least take this with you...
second_inn: Inn Keeper: Hello again, lost something?
third_inn: Inn Keeper: Hey, you look tired. I have a room avalible, do you want to take a rest?
town_main:
The village has a couple of buildings and a town center, 
you only see two options to enter.
mountain_begin: You see a bunch of dead bodies and a dreadfull feeling about this place.
mountain_middle:
As you walk you hear a grunt aproaching. 
Before you can even think about it an enormous Troll aprear! 
You can not run away this time. The fight will begin...
cave_entrance: You stop at the entrance. is dark and you can hear something further down there.
proceed_yes_no: Do you want to proceed? type 'Y' for yes and 'N' for no.
main_road:
You are in a main road, you only see three possible ways to proceed. 
Where you would like to go?
cave_option: The Cave -------- to go there type 'C'
village_option: The Village -------- to go there type 'V'
mountain_option: The Mountain ---- to go there type 'M'
cave_first:
As you enter the cave you notice an creature aproaching. 
It's a goblin, and it's going to attack you.
cave_second:
You go deeper on the cave you hear more steps aproaching. 
Another goblin appears to attack you!
game_greetings: Welcome to the Bald Mountain, a terminal-comand-line RPG developed using Python.
game_prologue:
Tired after spending a long day traveling you decide to set a camp 
close to a mountain known as the Bald Mountain. 
You wake up in the middle of the night hearing screams from the forest.
cave_finished:
Congratulations, you have cleaned the cave from the goblins! 
You found an armor.
